name: MT. LEBANON SCHOOL DISTRICT and Mt. Lebanon High School Authority v. W.R. GRACE AND COMPANY, a corporation, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Mt. Lebanon School District v. W.R. Grace & Co.

judges: Mr. Justice LARSEN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: MT. LEBANON SCHOOL DISTRICT and Mt. Lebanon High School Authority v. W.R. GRACE AND COMPANY, a corporation, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Mr. Justice LARSEN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
Mr. Justice PAPADAlKOS dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
631 A.2d 596
MT. LEBANON SCHOOL DISTRICT and Mt. Lebanon High School Authority v. W.R. GRACE AND COMPANY, a corporation, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 22, 1993.
Decided Oct. 15, 1993.
Reconsideration Denied Jan. 4, 1994.
